attributes.action: Make it a legal obligation for car manufacturers to fit immobilisers as standard
attributes.additional_details: Make it a legal requirement for car manufacturers to fit immobilisers on all vehicles fitted. This will lower insurance premiums as well help deter vehicle theft.
attributes.background: Vehicle theft is rampant due to how incredibly poor & lax manufacturer fitted car security systems are. It is encouraging car theft & creating a vicious circle of crime in the UK leaving people financially devastated due to both in rising insurance premiums as well as the cost of getting a new car

rejection.details: New cars require systems to prevent unauthorised use, immobilisers and a vehicle alarm system to enable them to be registered.
